intent_atoms.description: Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow introduced in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection/48_macOS_SwiftUI_Automation_Streaming_Default_Selection.md
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics on a platform that ships Combine, keeping throughput parity with the CLI harness.
XCTest skips the scenario on Linux because Combine is unavailable; therefore the benchmark must be run on macOS hardware.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests Execution
functional_units.description: Runs the ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Executes a Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.

functional_units.name: Global Logging and Telemetry Toggles for CLI Streaming
functional_units.description: Provides global logging and telemetry toggles exposed to the CLI once streaming metrics are available.
